summary.span: 可切换状态的控件基类，例如 。

span.span: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 属性指定的状态。The property specifies the state of the . 属性指定是否有两个或三个状态。The property specifies whether the has two or three states. ## 自定义 ToggleButton 控件Customizing the ToggleButton Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ToggleButton 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToggleButton Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置将仅具有某种效果如果该属性既 Button 控件的默认模板中存在，并且使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsChecked As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> IsChecked { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.IsChecked : Nullable<bool> with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets whether the is checked.

value.span: 如果 已选中，则为 ；如果 未选中，则为 false；否则为 。

span.span: if the is checked; false if the is unchecked; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的控件确定其行为，当此属性为`null`。A control that inherits from determines its behavior when this property is `null`. ## CheckBoxCheckBox 当属性设置为 true，用户可以单击选取三个可能的状态。When the property is set to true, a user can click a to pick three possible states. 下表描述了三个状态的。The following table describes the three states of a . |状态 State of the | 的值Value of | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |已选中Checked|`true`| |未选中状态Unchecked|`false`| |不确定Indeterminate|`null`| 如果为 false，仍以编程方式可以将此属性设置为`null`放置处于不确定状态，但用户不能设置为中间状态通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。If is false, you can still programmatically set this property to `null` to put the in an indeterminate state, but the user cannot set the to the indeterminate state through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## RadioButtonRadioButton 如果此属性设置为`null`上，则处于未选中状态。If you set this property to `null` on a , the is unchecked. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsChecked`=""/><*object* `IsChecked`=""/> - 或 --or- <*object* `IsChecked`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/><*object* `IsChecked`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建设置为不确定状态。The following example creates a set to an indeterminate state. [!code-xaml[CheckBox_Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CheckBox_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]
